name: "The Fields of Grey Visual 20" Life's a Ride II
description:
Visual 20 "Life's a Ride II"

"The Fields of Grey" is a 26-part visual chronicle narration of a community’s progression, but also one of personal growth and empowerment. "The Fields of Grey" leaves many open-ended interpretations up to the individual viewer.
All Visuals in the collection carry a theme and title, which can be discerned in multiple ways. The entire series was created with this concept of parallel perceptions and multiple meanings.

All 26 Visuals with the exception of Visual 1 “As Above, so Below” are 1/1 editions. Visuals were taken August 2021 in Kapatagan, Philippines.
Visual 1 is the only multi edition that was airdropped to the community.
